payroll.name: Payroll Compliance
payroll.description: Monitor payroll compliance risks including overtime violations, contract issues, and salary anomalies

overtime_violation.title: Overtime Violation Detected
overtime_violation.description: Employee has exceeded the legal overtime threshold. This may result in labor law violations and potential fines.
overtime_violation.actions:
1. Review employee workload and redistribute tasks
2. Approve compensatory time off
3. Document business justification if overtime is necessary
4. Review team capacity and consider hiring

contract_expiry.title: Contract Expiring Soon
contract_expiry.description: Employment contract is about to expire without a renewal in place. This may result in legal obligations or loss of talent.
contract_expiry.actions:
1. Review employee performance and decide on renewal
2. Prepare contract renewal or termination documentation
3. If not renewing, ensure proper notice period
4. Plan for knowledge transfer if applicable

salary_below_average.title: Salary Below Average
salary_below_average.description: Employee salary is significantly below the department average for their role. This may indicate pay equity issues.
salary_below_average.actions:
1. Review employee's performance history
2. Compare with market rates
3. Consider salary adjustment if warranted
4. Document justification for any pay difference

large_salary_change.title: Large Salary Change Detected
large_salary_change.description: A significant salary change was detected that may require additional review and approval.
large_salary_change.actions:
1. Verify the change was properly authorized
2. Document business justification
3. Ensure budget approval was obtained
4. Update relevant records

gender_pay_gap.title: Gender Pay Gap Detected
gender_pay_gap.description: A significant pay gap between genders was detected for the same role. This may violate equal pay regulations.
gender_pay_gap.actions:
1. Conduct detailed pay equity analysis
2. Review job grading and salary bands
3. Develop remediation plan
4. Document findings and actions for compliance
